00009 #pragma once
00010 #ifndef __X2D_KERNEL_H__
00011 #define __X2D_KERNEL_H__
00012 
00013 #include <boost/signals.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/bind.hpp>
00015 #include <deque>
00016 #include "compare.h"
00017 #include "clock.h"
00018 #include "timer.h"
00019 #include "camera.h"
00020 #include "viewport.h"
00021 #include "input_manager.h"
00022 #include "space.h"
00023 #include "log.h"
00024 
00025 namespace x2d 
00026 {
00027     class base_object;
00028  
00032     class kernel
00033     {
00034     public:
00035         typedef boost::signal<void (const clock_info&)> update_signal;        
00036         typedef boost::signal<void (const clock_info&)> render_signal;        
00037         typedef boost::signal<void (const std::vector<touch>&)> touch_input_signal;        
00038 
00039         typedef std::deque<timer*> timer_container;
00040         
00041         kernel();
00042         
00047         void add_viewport(const boost::shared_ptr<viewport>& vp);
00048         
00054         boost::shared_ptr<viewport> get_viewport_at(const point& p); // point is screen-space
00055         
00059         void pause()
00060         {
00061             is_paused_ = true;
00062             pause_time_ = sys_clock_.current_time();
00063         }
00064         
00068         void resume()
00069         {
00070             if(is_paused_)
00071             {
00072                 is_paused_ = false;
00073                 clock_info resume_time = sys_clock_.current_time();
00074                 
00075                 double compensation = resume_time.time - pause_time_.time;
00076 
00077                 // compensate all active timers
00078                 for( timer_container::iterator it = timers_.begin(); it != timers_.end(); ++it)
00079                 {
00080                     LOG("Compensating timer by %f", compensation / sys_clock_.stretch_);
00081                     (*it)->compensate(compensation / sys_clock_.stretch_);
00082                 }
00083             }
00084         }
00085         
00089         int step();
00090         
00094         void sys_timer_handler(const clock_info& ci);
00095         
00096         // Signal exposure
00097         // TODO: priorities (by z?)
00098         void connect_update( base_object* o );
00099         void connect_render( base_object* o );
00100         void connect_touch_input( space s, base_object* o );
00101         
00102         time::clock& sys_clock() 
00103         { 
00104             return sys_clock_; 
00105         }
00106         
00111         void enqueue(timer* t)
00112         {
00113             timers_.insert( 
00114                 std::lower_bound(timers_.begin(),
00115                                  timers_.end(),
00116                                     t, ptr_cmp<timer>()), t);
00117         }
00118         
00123         void dequeue(timer* t)
00124         {
00125             timers_.erase( 
00126                 std::remove(timers_.begin(),
00127                             timers_.end(),
00128                                 t ), timers_.end());  
00129         }
00130         
00131         // input support. this will be called by the input device
00132         // the kernel just passes it through to the input manager if any
00133         inline void on_touches_began(const std::vector<touch>& touches)
00134         {
00135             if(input_man_)
00136             {
00137                 input_man_->on_touches_began(touches);
00138             }
00139         }
00140         
00141         inline void on_touches_moved(const std::vector<touch>& touches)
00142         {
00143             if(input_man_)
00144             {
00145                 input_man_->on_touches_moved(touches);
00146             }
00147         }
00148         
00149         inline void on_touches_ended(const std::vector<touch>& touches)
00150         {
00151             if(input_man_)
00152             {
00153                 input_man_->on_touches_ended(touches);
00154             }
00155         }
00156         
00161         void set_input_manager(const boost::shared_ptr<input_manager>& inp)
00162         {
00163             input_man_ = inp;
00164         }
00165         
00166         void dispatch_touches_began(space s, const std::vector<touch>& touches);
00167         void dispatch_touches_moved(space s, const std::vector<touch>& touches);
00168         void dispatch_touches_ended(space s, const std::vector<touch>& touches);
00169 
00170     private:                
00171         // system
00172         time::clock     sys_clock_;
00173         timer           sys_timer_;
00174         
00175         clock_info      pause_time_;
00176         bool            is_paused_;
00177         
00178         timer_container timers_;
00179         
00180         // slots
00181         update_signal       update_signal_;
00182         render_signal       render_signal_;
00183         touch_input_signal  world_touches_began_signal_, world_touches_moved_signal_, world_touches_ended_signal_;
00184         touch_input_signal  screen_touches_began_signal_, screen_touches_moved_signal_, screen_touches_ended_signal_;
00185         
00186         // rendering
00187         typedef std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<viewport> > vp_vec;
00188         vp_vec          viewports_;
00189         int             cur_viewport_;
00190         
00191         // input
00192         boost::shared_ptr<input_manager> input_man_;
00193     };
00194     
00195 } // namespace x2d
00196 using namespace x2d;
00197 
00198 #endif // __X2D_KERNEL_H__
